p: Given these data, food additives could have a role in triggering the development of CeD if they are able to alter the gastrointestinal barrier, antigen presentation or the activation of the immune system. Although there are currently few experimental published data that specifically address the interaction between food additives and CeD, there are at least three possible categories that should be analyzed, namely transglutaminase, gluten nanoparticles and metallic nanoparticles.
